"Y-you remembered me?<br>Oh, thank you.":
"Ah, no, I don't really stand out,
so people never remember me...
I'm a bit surprised."

"Oh, um, that reminds me.
I've got another request for you.
That is...my next assignment came out."

"<%me>.If you wouldn't
mind, could you tell
me about Phongalph?"

"お、覚えててくれたんですか？
あっ、ありがとうございます。"

"あ、いえ、わたし目立たないから
いつも人に覚えてもらえなくって……
ちょっと、びっくりしました。"

"えっと、あの、それでですね。
